MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA15 postcode area of Greenock. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:00pm to safely complete repairs on our equipment located on Clynder Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:35pm on Saturday, 27 March 2021
